column3: Et yipm kako yetn wonemp , yep wule aiyipmel . Yapmonemp antarkoel ka ar mpilil , et kakilpe Wulapm Weink karokn yuwak an na semp yakop yer onto ankilel yupulp sankminamp koretel . Karokn . Kil wul an na yer onto ankilel . Krais Jisas ka nkamp yemp antelel wuntu ar lonkuntonkel apulp yapmonemp koretel antelel . Et sopilelel kil ka nantip mo arkomp an , apul an na yer onto ankilel yetn yemp yapelel yentemp yapmonemp mpililel . Kakilpe minamp sepmel an ko sopel ka sopeiye . An ko yupulp Wulapm Weink sitel , yekei kil nkael nako an yekei yapmonemp mintenkel niampepmitneipil nako kil sempop anel . Et an ko yekei onto niupuknel nkrawomp nti eikusukn . Kona an yupul sopilelel , ka nuarep an ka ontonkamp lontumpua nimimpiepm , kako ntunkuorp an aipopelel . Et an ko wamiyimp yapmonemp ntinkiliempel Wulapm Weinkel kile na yentempil yer sepmel yopmoiel . An kona yuwurel , arokn an kona nkis ekeipmelel , et an kako yentempil yer sepmel soplekekn .

Et yikn ko yoworpwonemp nti nako nti yekei wuntokn antuol yupul yapmonemp sepmel mitinkel . Nti kakorokn yer ntoka omoule oatorel , nti kako yer nto omoule ka aipmoyonel , et ko nti yekei onto niupuknel nkrawomp nti omoule weinkyankerel .

Et keiye an na yiki yipm yapmonempel et yipm ko sankyentemp nti omoule likipel ka nkarkemp nioknelmpel . Aser nti omoule ka nkarkemp muatiel , ko yipm mintenkitneip nti , ko nti nimpil yer niuluknun . Aser nti minimini ka awup ntinkiliempel ko yipm yikiwat nti . Kona yipm yupul ntokilelel , et yipm ko yekei yapmonemp eperiepmel yentemp nti eikusukn .

Sinsi eikusukn irpm kilelel kona yipm na yupulel , ko yipm yekei sank yimp Wulapm Weink yupulp na kil mintenkitneip yipmel . Aninkanink ko yipm yekei salpiknin Pirpm ankilelel yimp yimp kil . Yipm ko yetn niampepm ntankuel , omoule aiyipmel korokn likipel yuwa . Yipm ko yimp Wulapm Weink ntenktenkel yupulp nti ementitmuaken eikusukn ka ankilel , ko kil yupulp nti .

Antarko wielekekn Pol , antempel Sailas nti Timoti , an apul wupm keielel ka nakimp yipm mamuntoump antelel , ementitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel ka ar yemp suknel Tesalonaikael , yipm ka ar onto Waiek Ekeipmel antemp Sepmel Antelel Jisas Krais . An ka aiyimp Wulapm Weink nako kil wonempyupulp yipm nako kil yok yipm yapmonemp niluknunel .

Kona yapmonemp omouleel ka mintenk apulp Wulapm Weink ka nti aiyimpilel , Sepmel ko nimpil yupul omoule ka wule apulel ko nimpil sepmel nako kil nimpil yiki kil . Et kil ka ar nkis minamp koretelel , Sepmel kana nimpil nkimer minamp yapmonemp koretel irpm ankilel kilelel .

Nti omoule eikusukn ka kumpueik nakaworp yapmonemp Wulapm Weinkel , nti ka nak apulpilel . Nti ka nak na nti minimini yapmonemp antuol kana mintenk yupulp omoule kile ka Wulapm Weink yuwak na sempop anel , kona nti yekei nio Jisasel nkael , Wulapm Weink kako wonempsukurel yapmonemp kuoretel antuolel . ”

Epe Pita nakimp nti omoule Koniliusel nak na , “ Yipm la kei , nako an yekei nio Jisas Kraisel wurp yipm yo mpep . ” Kil wurp nti ementitmuaken o mpep niatel , nti aiyimp Pita na kil ko yentemp nti yerel .

Kona ntokilelel , yipm ko ntinkirai yumpulp na Wulapm Weink kakorokn walil . Sinsi mi ka kil nak etetelel na kil na yupulel , kil kakorokn yupul wanemwanem sop nti mpurel nakel . Karokn . Aser kil karokn apulp na emelel ko niyoel . Karokn . Kil ka apulp na yipmarko eikusukn kako nimpilemp yapmonemp . Kil wonempapulp yipm , kakilpe kil ka yukueimp yipm .

Et kakilpe Wulapm Weink ka ok an pris suknel ka nkamp miepm antelel etn nimuonel ar niampepm Wulapm Weinkel . Ka Jisas ankil , kil ka ninkilapm Wulapm Weinkel . Yapmonemp ankilel ka akuor apulp an apulp mintenk antelel karokn sukn . Ka apulp kil ka kumpueik ar kitapm keielel , wankepm mitinkel ka ninkempil soplekekn keiye an ninkempelel . Apulp na waker yuwup yapmonemp ankilel , aser kil karokn apul yapmonemp koretel lekekn . Karokn .

Et yipm semp sinsi mintenkel Wulapm Weinkel kile na akaik yipm yuwa kitapm mintenk . Sinsi mintenkel yipm ko yupulel ka ntokeiye . Sank yapmonemp ka etetelel ko yipm yump yer yapmonemp yapelel aiyipmel nako mintenkitneip yipm kipmin kriekn aiyipmel ntoka mo ka nti omoule napolel akei ntemp tumpualenk antuolel . Yatel , Wulapm Weink ka apul yipm na yer sepmel ntinkirai milmpink yer niampepm ankilel , nako yipm yer nkis minamp akosepmelel . Yipm ko semp niokn kilelel ka kil apulp yipmel nako yikm yekei yupul nuarep nti omoule napolel ka ntri wapm ain ka awulmp yapmonemp antuolel .

Niokn sepmel ka Wulapm Weink apulp yipmel , ka kil nantip mo arkomp yipm nako yipm yentempil yer sepmel yopmoiel . Niokn sepmel kile ko yipm semp yump yer yapmonemp yapel aiyipmel , nako mpuanink yipm nuarep loaikn mintenkel ka awulmp omoule napolel amamp yupulp yenk kakorokn yepere kil amamp . Aser sank Wulapm Weinkel ka Pirpm Sepmel ankil ak yipmel ka nuarep wakirpmel ko yipm semp yupul yupulp ko yipm yekei nopolel .
Mamuntoump antelel nti , yipm korokn sirkemp sankminamp sepmel , et yipm korokn likip yupulp .
Wupm irpm ka an apulp yipmel antempel sank ka an nakimp yuwap yipmel , ko yer nimimpiepm yer yapmonemp aiyipmel nako yipm yetn mintenkel .
Kumpueikel Devit ka nak apulp Jisas sopeiye na , “ Aninkanink apm aser Wulapm Weink ka etn apm opmoump mintenkitneip apm , et kakilpe apm karokn nkinkiekn apulp sinsi mimi ko ninkemp apmel .
Apm nakimp yipm etetel , kona emelel yapmonemp ankilel ko mintenk yupulp apmel , kil ko yer sepmel yopmoiel .

An korokn nkinkiekn wulile yupulp na la yimp Wulapm Weinkel . Apulp kona an nikitemp Wulapm Weink mi kona aiyimp antelel yentemp upuikn ankilel nkuntoel , yapmonemp antelel ko porpork yumpulp na kil arai eipm an . Et kona ntokilelel , an ko ser yoworel yumpulp na , karep kil amuk an sop ka an aiyimpilel .

Wulapm Weink ka nak etet nkuntoel nakimp an apulp niokn suknel ankilel ka kumpueik kil apulel . Kil ka ok an salpiknin apulp na an yentempil yer sepmel yopmoiel . Weink apulp salpiknin kilelel ka itnei ninkilapm ankilel .

Et kakilpe kona omouleel semp Ninkilapm Wulapm Weinkel yump yer nilmpniumpuaipm ankilelel , kil sit ka antemp Wulapm Weink ar sepmel apmoiel . Et omouleel karokn nkamp Ninkilapm Wulapm Weinkel aimp ar nilmpniumpuaipm ankilelel , kil kakorokn yentempil yer sepmel yopmoiel .
Et apm karokn numpul apulp wule apmelel . Apm ka ar antemp yapmonemp mpuaimpuaiel nak naremp Wulapm Weink . Apm niampepm itneipil apulp sinsi mimi kil na yupulp apmel .
Kona ntokilelel , yipmarko ementitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel lekekn lekekn kako yekei sank keielel na mintenkitneip yipm aiyipm sop karep yipm apulel .

Nti omoule ka kumpueik nak aworp yapmonemp Wulapm Weinkel , nti Juda ka ar nti wuntu . Nti ka ar Sepmel Antelel Jisas wuntu soplekekn . Et nti ka naimpil apul an koret soplekekn nker an naikul yemp aiyipmel nkarpmok . Nti ka naimpil apul sopeiye aninkanink . Wulapm Weink aser ntiel , nti ka antemp nti omoule eikusukn nkisemp wurokn yanker . Aiyapel antelel ka an na yetn nikimp nti omoule krieknel sank Wulapm Weinkelel , ka nti ntumunkuorp . Nti ka apulp na an korokn nikimp nti omoule krieknel sank sepmel kilelel et ko nti nimpilemp yapmonemp na yer onto Wulapm Weinkelel . Nti apul sopilelel , ka tikiremp an yapmonemp koretel antuol ka nkarp suknelimp . Kakilpe yapmonemp Wulapm Weinkel ka ntinkiliemp antemp nti , karep niminkemp nti .

Kona emelel ka waker sank salpikninel ka Moses nakimp anel , mi kona nti omoule wieel mi wielekeknel ka niampepm nkisilel , nti arko ko nintem nako nek yoworpil . Omoule kile , nti omoule ka mpunti silel kako yumpil wuntu wareel yumpulp . Aser wankepm kilelel ka akopitekn . Et emelel ka nkamp sank ka yitompel apulp Kraisel aimp o yapmonemp ankilelel , et kona kil nimpil yupul yupul sop sankminamp kuoretel sop upuikn ankilelel , omoule kile kako sumump wankepm sukn nkernkerel . Ka apulp omoule kile ka akei akaik ntemp Ninkilapm Wulapm Weinkel nantip kitapm . Kumpueikel , yarkup Jisasel ka Wulapm Weink akei nuarep wuniapmel ka kaikul yapmonemp omoule kilelel ntinkiraiyimp , yarkup kilelel ka sinsi sompuon mpimpilai . Aser kona omoule kile kana yupul sop upuikn ankilel sopilelel , ka nuarep ka kil apul yarkup Jisasel na sankuorkel . Kona ntokilelel yarkup Jisasel kakorokn yer sompuon mpimpilai , kako nuarep sinsi kuoretel . Ka nuarep omoule kile nak na , “ Onto eik nisepel . Yarkup Jisasel karokn apul niokn suknel . Yewemp . ” Pirpm Wulapm Weinkel ka akei yapmonemp sepmel sitel apulp anel , aser kona omoule kile yupul sop upuikn ankilelel , ka ntikiremp an apulp yapmonemp ankilel ka nak na Pirpm Sepmel ka niepel mankirpmel . Kona an yupul sopilelel , ko mini nimpil yupul niokn sepmel sop kumpueik Jisas apulel nako nimpil sompop anel ? Karokn . Aiyapel yatel karoknip . Et kakilpe nti omoule sopilelel ko yer yentemp nkinkiekn sit nako yukueimp Wulapm Weink . Aser karokn walil kil kako yuntunel ntika kuoretelel . Nti omoule ka antempil nkisemp wurokn sopilelel , nti ko yukueimp yete ankilel kana yel nti miniatelimp .

Sepmel Antelel Jisas Krais , ka ok an salpiknin ankilel , et an nakimp nti kuorelel mintenkel nak na , “ Yipm nkis yitonk ntemp yo kitapm , ko yipm yupul nioknelmp irpm aiyipmel , nako niumuapm yuwa yipmel ! ”
An mpurel ka kitapm Pertiael , mpurel ka Midiael , mpurel ka Elamel , mpurel ka Mesopotamiael , mpurel ka Judiael , mpurel ka Kapadosiael , mpurel ka Pontiusel , mpurel ka Esiael ,

Aninkel kilelel , muati antuol nti ntitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel ka mitimitink yatip . Et nti mpurel antuol ka nak sank Grikel , nti ka nak nokuap antemp nti mpurel ka nak sank Aramel , et nti nak nimpitnilmp nakimp nti aposel . Nti ka yapmonemp wankepm apulp kona nti aposel walimp miepmel , nti ka wawor nti muakenarenk antuol Grikel ok nti muakenarenk Aramel sitel .
An antemp yipm arel , sank salpikninel lekekn an nakimp yipmel nak na , “ Kona emel karokn na yupul nioknel , et kil ko yer nilmpel . Yipm korokn yuwa kil miepm yel . ”
Aninkel nti nak sopilpe , aser muanumpuor yankerel lekekn naimpil nakimp nti sank nak na , “ Apm ntinkirai apulp Jisas antempel Pol , aser yipm ankil , yipmarko ka mini ? ”
Omoule ka al wule aikn apmelel antempel yarkup apmelel , kil ka ar antemp apm , et apm ka antempil arel .

Kakilpe nti ementitmuaken ka amamp yile awulmp sank irpm ka nti aposel nakimp yuwap ntiel . Aninkanink nti ka nkis al miepm ar lekekn , yapmonemp antuol ka ar lekekn sitel . Et nti ka ntenktenk aiyimp Wulapm Weink antempil nak sank .

Kil naimpil nak niuwuwul nti omoule ankilel , aser nti akei wakirpm aimp Jems , es Jonel , wuntuimp ar awun suknel Pasowa . Herot apul sopilelel , epe kil nkamp ntinkirai ampulp yapmonemp antuol Judael . Nti ka mpuaimpuai apulp ka kil ar Jems wuntuel , kakilpe kil nkamp Pita mper kil apmoi yetne kuoretel .

Nti ementitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel ka akei Jisas nkael , sank ka nti arkos lekekn , epe yapmonemp antuolel ka ar lekekn sit . Nti eikusukn karokn narkimp sinsi nak na , “ Sinsi keielel ka apmelelip , et yipm korokn semp . ” Karokn . Sinsi irpm antuol , ka ntiarko eikusukn mper la lekekn .

Nti omoule ementitmuaken eikrieknel ka ar wampwampel eipm sank sopilelel , yapmonemp antuol ka mpuaimpuai yatip apulp sank kilelel . Et nti nak tukuarempil na , “ Sank Wulapm Weinkel kile ka akolekekn yatip ! ” Nti minimini ka Wulapm Weink ankil yuwak nti nako nti yentempil yer sepmel aninkaninkel , nti ntitmuaken kile ka nimpilemp yapmonemp na nsop aiyapel ankilel .
An karokn nak nako yipm nker kil nuarep omoule ka antemp yipm nkisemp wurokn yankerel . Karokn . Ko yipm yekei yapmonemp niuluknunel yoworkwonempil , sankantempil . Kil ka mamuntomp aiyipmel .

Aser kil karokn wonempaser wule ankilel ka kil apulp an na wuntu ar lo nkuntonkelel . Kona ntokilelel kil kuatiar nker yapmonemp kuoretel eikusukn antelel apulp an na yer yapmonemp ntinkiraiel ntoka ementitmuaken ankilelel . An ko yetn mintenkel nekerpm minamp sepmel sit .
Pirpm Wulapm Weinkel ka kil ok anel , ka nkupmus an nilmpniumpuaipm . Et kakilpe an aser amorel apulp an ka antemp Wulapm Weink apmoi et kil ka ar antemp an apmoiel .

Kona yapmonemp omouleel na nkierp yupulp na semp wuntokn suknelel , sinsi mitinkel kileko ukuapil na yupul yapmonemp kuoretel mitinkelel . Kil kako yump yapmonemp ka kukoelel , kana yupul kil milminelimp . Ka kako nuarep wus wurokn ka aikuol moyipmampel . Kil kakorokn sinkeip mo yerkompil ankil .

Kakilpe Pita akei sank irpm yatel mintenkel nakimp nti . Kil aiyimpukuap nti , sankantemp nti , nak na “ Et yipm ko nkis niampepm tankuel . Yipm kakorokn sop nti ementitmuaken ka yapmonemp kuoretel mpuanink ntiel . Minamp antuol kilelel kako yipm nisep , et yipm korokn semp wankepm yentemp ntiel . ”
An aser ntinkirai , yipm ka ementitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel , ka apulp kil ankil ka yuwak yipmel . Sopilelel ka an apiser kil ka upuikn apulp yipm yatip .

Nkarp erienel , Jon aser Jisas ka la na ser kilel , et Jon napmok na , “ Et yipm ser . Kil kile ka wusipsip siknamp ka oumpyepm Wulapm Weink mperel . Weink kil ka o kitapmel , ka kil na wanteip yapmonemp koretel antuol ementitmuaken kitapmel nako miniatimp .

Aser keielel , Timoti naimpil nanketel sukueimp an apulp yipm , apulp yapmonemp aiyipmel ka ar mintenk apulp Wulapm Weink . Kil nak na yipm ka akei ontonipuknel nkrawomp nti omoule eikusukn . Kil nakimp an na aninkanink yipm ka akei yapmonemp niuluknunel wonempwaiyimp an , mpuaimpuai apulp an . Kil nak na upuikn aiyipmel ka suknelip na ser anel , ka soplekekn yapmonemp antelel apulp yipmel . An ka naimpil eipm sopilelel , yapmonemp antelel ka mpuaimpuai yatip apulp yipm ,

Wulapm Weink akei niampepm aser kil aimpar nti ementitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel ka kil samunkuork ntiel , nti ka yakukulim . Kil ka nkamump salpiknin suknel ka ar niorknel amulmp nti oupmweink eikusuknel antempel nti omoule wampwampel ka ar kitapm sukurelel ka nak sank yatyatel antemp nti omoule entieaikn yatyatel .

Aninkanink yapmonemp aiyipmel ko yer yentemp mpuaimpuai sitel , nako yipm yimp Wulapm Weink nikimpil sank ntenktenkel . Kona sinsi mimi sepm koret ninkemp yipmel , et yipm ko nek tukuaremp Wulapm Weink yumpulp . Kona Krais Jisas yer yopmoi nilmpniumpuaipm aiyipmelel , et yapmonemp Wulapm Weinkel nak na yipm ko yupul sopilpe .

Aser an ka ntinkirai apulp Jisas ka kumpueik awurel , aser Wulapm Weink aki kil ka naimpil nkarpmop . Kakilpe an ka ntinkirai apulp Wulapm Weink kileko yekei salpiknin ankilel na yupulp nti omoule ankilel ko nimpil serp soplekekn . Kil ko semp nti omoule ka akei kil nkaelel nako ntiarko yentemp Jisas yer sepmel yopmoiel .

Ka apulp Sepmel Antelel ka akei sank salpikninel nakimp an na , Apm ka apul yikn ka ar nuarep yete ka lep nti ementitmuaken eikrieknel ka ar wampwamp kipe ar kitapm sukurel . Nako yikn ankil ntikiremp nti aiyapel nako Wulapm Weink nantip mo yerkomp ntiel . ”

Keielel Jisas ka nkamump mpunti suknel apmoi onto yapel Wulapm Weinkel . Waiek Ekeipmel ok kil Pirpm Sepmel ankilel nsop kumpueikel ka kil nak etet kuntoel apulpilel . Et kakilpe ka Pirpm Sepmel kile Jisas ka apul o , ok ntiel , ka weink apulp sinsi irpm kilelel ka yipm eipm aserel . ”

Et yikn ko yep mamuntoump Kristenel aiyiknel . Yipmwie korokn yel miepm tinam sampol . Kumpueikel an sankantemp yipm nakimp yipm apulp kona yipm yupul minamp koretel kilelel , et Wulapm Weink kileko yupul yipm milminelimp .
Nti omoule ka Wulapm Weink wul nti na yuwulmp yipmel , et yipm ko yep nti waleiel eipm sank antuol . Nti ka awor sank ntontomp tikiremp yipm aiyapel Wulapm Weinkel , et ko yipm nekerpmel .
Apm anser wus yanker yatelel ka naimpil ninink sopilel , ka naikul eik kitapm noel . . . .
Kona emel aiyipmel ninkemp wankepm miel , kil ko nek sank yimp Wulapm Weink yupulp . Et kona yapmonemp emelel ka mpuaimpuaiel , kil ko yekei wampen kana yiki nio Wulapm Weinkel .

Upuikn Wulapm Weinkel ka sopeiye . Yapmonemp nilmpniumpuaipm sukurel aiyipmel ko yipm mper yer onto Wulapm Weinkel nako yipm yer ntinkirai nkis sankminamp sepmel sitel . Et yipm ko yep wule aiyipmel , korokn yupul mualakntankermp .

Wankepm irpm ka ninkemp yipmel antempel yakop yipm nkampel ka nti omoule mpurel ok yipm apulp nti ka nkarkemp aiyapel Jisasel ka yipm nakerpmel . Et yipm karokn nkark . Yipm ka etn mintenk arkuos wankepm kilelel ka nti ok yipmel . An ka natip yipm yatip apulp minamp kilelel . Et kakilpe an ka etn la wampwamp sukueimp nti ementitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel apulp yipm , an ka aki nio aiyipmel namp ekeipm .

Nti nak ntokilelel ka apulp sank ka Wulapm Weink nakel ka nti eik eipmel , nti karokn aimp ar yapmonemp . Ka nti karokn eipm akuorp kumpueik ka Wulapm Weink akei sank nakel na ka mpuor ekeipm ninink antempel kitapm ka kil apul na ninink ar mpep nimuonelel .

An nkamp mpunti Jisas Kraisel ka Sepmel Antelel nako an nikimp yipm sank salpikninel lekekn . Nti mamuntomp aiyipmel ka yuwa likipel apulp niokn antuolel , et yipm ontonisep nti na yer antuol yatel . Nti karokn apul sop sank an ka nakimp yuwap yipmel .
Kona emelel na ontoyentemp yapmonemp irpm sinsi kitapmel , kil ka antemp Wulapm Weink nkisemp wurokn yanker .
. . . . Aser yipm omoule ka aimp yapmonemp wieel apulp sinsi kitapmel antempel sank Wulapm Weinkel , et yipm ko nker yapmonemp kile la peik nako yapmonemp aiyipmel yer lekekn sitel .
Ka apulp Wulapm Weink karokn ukuap yipm nako yipm yapmonemp nirkutupel ko yipm waker wule aiyipmelel . Karokn . Ka kil ukuap yipm na yer nkis musukorel sop sankminamp sepmel sitel .

Sinsi mintenkel irpm ka nti omoule napolel nar awulmp omouleel ka muati apulp minamp irpm sinsi ka Wulapm Weink akei apulp anel nako mpuanink an soplekeknel . Et kakilpe akaik aiyiknel yipm yuwa kitapm mintenk nako yipm nek nker Satan , omoule wurokn yankerel antelel , yupulp yapmonemp koretel irpm ka kil nak aimop apulp na timpielp anel . . . . .
Jisas naimpil nak na , “ Et kona yipm nekerpm sank apmelel aipopelel , kako ntikiremp nti eikusukn yupulp yapmonemp etetel aiyipmel , ka yipm apulp apmel .
Kumpueikel yapmonemp aiyipmel karokn akuor apulp Wulapm Weink , aser yipm ka akei pirpm antuol manmaknel ka ar mpuanink yipm . Yipm ka yep nti ntoka nti ka salpikninel , aser ka nti ninkai yipmel .

Niokn irpm ka kil apul ar Israel antempel yemp suknel Jerusalem ka ar kitapm Judael , ka an niampepm ntanku nkupmus , kipe an sunkueimp nti wampwamp . Nti ntemp Jisas ar lonkuntonkel et kil ka wuntuimp .

Nti aposel ka apul niokn mintenkel mitinkel . Et kakilpe nti omoule ka wule apule , nti ka mper nti ar waiminink ar nantip aiyapel ka Pita na yetn lael , apulp na nti ka upuikn nako muati Pitael na sankuork nti omoule ka wule apulel .

Satan , omoule amamp antuol muanumpuor yankerel , kil kana yekei ntamaiyenk ankilel ka yeteyeteel yump yipm omoule na yupul yipm milminel . Aser yapmonemp aiyipmel ko yer mintenk yentemp Wulapm Weink yekei kil nkael . Yipm kona yupul ntokilelel , kuatiar ntunkuorp yipm yukur yete yer yenk nai ka Satan akeiel . Kona ntokilelel , ko nuarep lontumpo ka nti omoule napolel ontonkamp nimimpiepm apulp na lep yenk wakirpmel .

Apm nkark pupurur apulp yapmonemp yipm apulel . Niokn ka Krais apul na wonempapulp yipmel ka apulp na yipm'a yer sop ntitmuaken ankilelel . Aser karokn walil , yipm naimpil ninsep Wulapm Weink , yipm'a sop sank sepmel yatelel .
Kona emel korokn yupul sop sank kipe an apul sil wupm kipelelel , et yipm ko niuknuyuwap kil aipopelel . Yipm korokn yentempil yer nkis , et kil ko semp wulemaiak yupulp minamp koretel ankilel .

Aser yipm karokn ar nkis minamp koretel sop ntiel nako yapmonemp koretel yer mpuanink yipmel . Karokn . Ka Pirpm Wulapm Weinkel ar mpuanink yipm apulp na kil ka antemp yipm arel . Nti omoule minimini ka Pirpm Kraisel antemp nti arel , nti sit ka omoule Kraisel . Oroknel , nti kakorokn .

Omouleel ka ar yemp suknel kilelel , nio ankilel ka Saimon . Kil ka omoule yalepmel ka akei salpiknin kirapmel apul mimiel , et nti ntitmuaken Samariael aser kilel , nti ka nkark eik utnumpulel ankil . Kil onto aimp yapm nak aki nio ankilel no ekeipm apulp niokn mintenkel irpm ka kil apulel .

Yikn ka ntikiremp yuwap apm sankminamp sepmel nako apm yer sepmel ntinkiraiel aninkaninkel yer niampepm aiyiknel . Aser aninkel apm kona yentemp yikn yerel , apm ko eik mpuaimpuaiel . ” Keielel ka sank ka Devit sukueiel .
Kona omouleel na nek nker sank kilelel , kil karokn nak nker sank omoule kitapmel sitel . Karokn . Ka kil nak nker Wulapm Weink ankil , apulp Pirpm Sepmel Ankilel ka antemp an ar apmoiel .

Kakilpe kona yipm puikn na ntinkirai yupulp Pirpm Wulapm Weinkel , ka kil ankil apul niokn mi karokn , nako yipm sop aiyapel kilelel . Kona kil omoule nak na , “ Jisas Krais ka omoule sop anel ” , kakilpe yipm ko ntinkirai yupulp Pirpm Wulapm Weinkel ka apei omoule kilelel epe .

Mamintoump apmelel nti , ka yipm aripil sopilelel , et yikn ko yetn mintenk yupul yapmonemp ntinkiraiel yer niampepm Wulapm Weinkel . Kona kil yuntunel anel , ko kil ser yapmonemp ntinkiraiel aiyipmelel . Aser yapmonemp kuoretel kakorokn . Yipm ko yer yapmonemp mintenk yentemp Wulapm Weink , nako kil ser sankminamp aiyipmel kilelel .

Et yipm ampu eipm sankel kile apm'a nikimp yipmel . Yipm yimp Sepmel Antelel ko kil mintenkitneip an , et sopilelel sank ankilel ko sikir etn la wampwamp . Kona nti eipm sank ankilelel , nti kako yep sank keielel ntoka sinsi suknel sop ka kumpueik yipm apulel .

Yipm korokn mproel yupulp . Satan ka antun wupm akei an niampepm ninkai anel , nako an nek na kil ka akolekekn yatip ntoka ensel Wulapm Weinkel . Et kakilpe yapmonemp yipm korokn pupurur yupulp nti omoule nioknel Satanel , ka nti apul soplekekn . Nti ka akei wule eikrieknel apul sankminamp sepmel apulp na ninkai yipmel , nako yipm nek na nti ka ementitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel . Aser karokn .

Kona wule yupul emel aiyipmel , kil ko yimp nti omoule amamp niorknel ka awulmp nti ementitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel la ser kil . Et nti ko nek sank yentemp Wulapm Weink nikimpil yupulp kil na yupul omoule kile nimpil sepmelel , nako nti yekei nio Sepmelel yupulp mpep wel ko nti nimpirp yekei nkualeik omoule kile .

Aser Wulapm Weink naimpil aki kil nkarp apmoi yemp muanel . Jisas ka nkamp yakop suknel , epe kil wuntuimp . Aser na mintenk yempoumpel kakorokn ntunkuorpil . Ka apulp Wulapm Weink naimpil aki kil nkarpmop .

Antemp aninkanink , an ka nak naremp Wulapm Weink apulp yipm , ka apulp yapmonemp aiyipmel ka ar mintenk antempil , ka sankuork yapmonemp mintenkel aiyipmel karepel . Yipm eikusukn ka mpuaimpuai na yupulp yipm aiyipm yapmonemp sepmel aninkaninkel . Et minamp sepmel ka yipm nkisel karep kakir mila eikriekn , et kakilpe an ka nak tukuaremp Wulapm Weink apulp yipm .

Wulapm Weink nak etetelel ka kil ko yupul kitapm irpm mpuor otniompoiel . Aser nti ementitmuaken eikusukn wampwampel kako nekerpm sankminamp sepmel sitel . Keielel an ka eik aripwakerpel sinsi otniompoiel kilelel ka na nininkel .

Aninkanink an antemp Wulapm Weink nak sankel , ka an nak tukuarempil apulp yipm . Yipm ka ar nkis sankminamp sepmel apulp yipm ka akei Wulapm Weink nkael . Yapmonemp aiyipmel ka mpuaimpuai apulpil sitel . Yipmarko ka akei ontonipuknel nkrawomp ntiarko , et yipm ka ntinkiliemp ka apul niokn Wulapm Weinkelel . Yapmonemp aiyipmel ka mintenk ampulp Krais , et yipm niampepm itneipil nako kil yupul yipm sepmel . Ka weink apulp yipm ka etn mintenk apulp wankepm mimiel ka napir yipmel .
Et yipm ko yapmonemp mintenk yupulp Wulapm Weink , nako yipm yetn mintenk na nek yuntun Satanel .

Satan ka pirpm kuoretel , ka kil awulmp kitapm sukurel keielel . Kil apul niokn ankilel ar yapmonemp antuol nti omoule ka yapmonemp karokn akuor apulp Wulapm Weinkel , aser kil kitip nti yapmonemp amu lekekn . Et kakilpe yapmonemp antuol kakorokn mpilil yupulp Krais ka nio nkampel . Jisas ka nkamp molomuati Wulapm Weinkel , aser nti karokn eipm aworel sank sepmel apulpilel nako nkis yapmonemp antuolel .

Kakilpe yipm kakorokn yapmonemp wiewie , yipm ko yapmonemp mintenk na nek sopeiye na , “ Apm kakorokn nkinkiekn yupulp nti omoule , nti kakorokn yupulp apm sitel . Apulp Sepmel apmelel ka kampop apm . ”
Nilmpniumpuaipm Kraisel ka antemp an apeielel . Kakilpe an korokn numpul yupulp sinsi mimi ko ninkemp anel , apulp kil ka ntunkuorp an .

Sank yatel an na nikimp yipmel ka sopeiye . An ka apulp na yipm ko eipm yokuorp yupulp sinsi mi kileko ninkemp nti omoule aiyipmel ka kumpueik awurelel . Et yipm korokn saiyip muan wuntulekeknel na numpul yupulp nti ntoka nti ementitmuaken eikrieknel apulel . Nti karokn yapmonemp mintenk apulp Wulapm Weink ko nti niampepm itneipilel , et nti ka ar antemp yapmonemp wankepmel sitel .

Aser Krais ka ar yipm nilmpniumpuaipm sopilelel , ka apulp niokn sepmel kil apulel ka milinyuwa yipm . Ka apul yapmonemp aiyipmel ka karep ntinkiraiyimp , nako pirpm aiyipmel ankil yer sepmel yopmoiel . Omoule entieaikn aiyipmel kako yuwur yupulp yapmonemp kuoretel irpm ,

Yipmarko mamuntomp antelel nti , an nak naremp Wulapm Weink ntenktenk apulp yipm . Ka apulp kumpueik eik nimpiliekn lael , Wulapm Weink ankil ka yuwak yipm . Pirpm Sepmel ankilel ka apul niokn apmoi yapmonemp nilmpniumpuaipm aiyipmel nako kil ye yipm mper yatelel , et yipm ko ankilelimp . Sank sepmel Wulapm Weinkel ampueik an nakimp yipmel , yipm ka nkamp aimp o yapmonemp aiyipmel nak na sank ka susukelimp , et yapmonemp aiyipmel ka ar mintenk ampulp . Sopeiye , Wulapm Weink ka nantip mo arnkomp yipm et ka yipm ar ntoka ntitmuaken ankilelel . An ka aser amorel upuikn ankilel , kil ka apulp yipm yatip . Karep kil aiyimp yipm na yipm'a yer yentemp Sepmel Antelel Jisas . Nio sepmel kana sempilel , yentempel salpiknin suknel ankilel ka ntoka yete akosepmel ka milipmalaiknelel ko yuwulmp Jisas yipmarko soplekekn . Et kona ntokilelel , aninkanink an ka nak tukuarempil ampulp yipm .

Epe Pita nakimp nti nak na , “ Yipm eiksukn lekekn lekekn nimpilemp yapmonemp yewemp sankminamp kuoretel aiyipmel nako an yekei nio Jisas Kraisel wurp yipm yo mpep et ko Wulapm Weink nker yapmonemp kuoretel aiyipmel . Yipm kona yupul ntokilelel , Wulapm Weink ko yok yipm Pirpm Sepmel ankilel .
Kona emelel na yupul yipm koretel , yipm korokn nimpil yupul kil koret ware . Karokn . Aninkanink et yipm ko yekei yapmonemp sepmel yentemp yipm aiyipm nompueip nti ntitmuaken eikrieknel eikusuknel .

Et kakilpe , yipm ko yewemp yapmonemp koretel aiyipmel kilelel , et yipm kako nimpilemp yapmonemp aiyipmel nako yipm yuwup Wulapm Weink na nker yapmonemp koretel aiyipmel , nako kil yok yipm yapmonemp ntinkirai niuluknunel . ”
Nti omoule mini ka al wule antemp yarkup apmelel , kil ka ar sepm apmoi apmoiel . Et kona kitapm niatelel , apm ko yiki kil nimpil serpmop .

Omoule ka nak sank ninkaielel ka mini ? Ka omoule kilpe ka nak na , “ Jisas karokn omoule kilelel ka Wulapm Weink yuwakel nako sempop nti ementitmuaken ankilel . Karokn . ” Omoule ka nak sank ntokilpelel kil ka sirep nio Jisasel aser kil ka sirep nio Waiek Ekeipmel antempel . Kil ka omoule wurokn yankerel Kraisel .

Aser yikn ka kuko yatip . Kona yikn nek na yapmonemp yikn ka mintenk apulp Wulapm Weinkel aser yikn karokn apul sop minamp sepmel ka sop sank ankilelel , sank aiyiknel kile ka wurkopm karokn naker , et ka yikn eik nkis nak nak kuserelel .

Sepmel Antelel ka omoule akosepmel , et an ko yekei kil nkael apulp kil kako yupul sop sank etet kuntoel eikusukn ka kil nakel , nako kil mintenkitneip yipm yapmonemp , mpuanink yipm yupulp Satan kakorokn yupul yipm milminel .

Aser yipm mpurel karokn yapmonemp mintenk apulp apmel . ” Jisas nak ntokilelel , ka apulp kumpueikel , anink sukur kil apul nioknel , kil ka nimpiriepm apulp nti omoule mini kakorokn yapmonemp mintenk yupulpilel . Et kako nti yumopil yapmonemp wieel nako mper kil yer onto antuol omouleel nti kana yer kil wuntuel .

Nti omoule Judael mpurel ka etn la kilkil apul niokn wuntokn nker nti muanumpor yanker . Nti ampu na yekei nio Sepmel Jisasel sukuei apulp na nker nti muanumpuor yankerel ko yerkomp nti ementitmuakenel . Nti ka nak sopeiye na , “ An nakimp yipm mintenk ar nio Jisasel ka Pol nakel , et yipm ko nukul yewemp omoule kilelel . ”
Ar niampepm Wulapm Weinkel , yapmonemp aiyiknel ka koret niepwalpuku . Et kakilpe yikn kakorokn la yentemp an yupul niokn Wulapm Weinkel kipe an apulel . Karokn . ”

Nti eikusukn ka apul la lekekn , nti ka waiyimp opmoump amor Wulapm Weink , et sank ankilel ka nti akei opmoump eik wapel . Nti eikusukn ka omoule koretel sitel . Nti karokn apul minamp sepmelel lekekn irpm . Karoknip ! ”

Ntiwie yukur no waike nioupmel ar Atalia la nampir Antiok . Nti ntitmuaken Wulapm Weinkel ka ar Antiokel nti ka kumpueik aiyimp Wulapm Weink apulp yapmonemp sepmel ankilel ko yer yuwulmp ntiwie apulp nako ntiwie yupul niokn ankilelel . Aser niokn kile , karep ntiwie apul miniat , ntiwie naimpil naminket Antiok .

Kona yipm yekei salpiknin Wulapm Weinkel na nopolel , et yipm ko wonempwaiyimp aipopel . Nti ementitmuaken kitapmel karokn omoule wuroknel antelel . Karokn . An ka napol antempel sinsi koretel irpm ka ar nkuwepmel . Nti ka salpiknin ntarinienk yatip , aser nti ka apul salpiknin kitapmel na yer suknel et nti ka akei nti omoule antempel sinsi irpm nkuwur , mintenkitneip yapmonemp nimpiempel eikusuknel ka ar kitapm keielel .

Kona yapmonemp aiyipmel ka mproel apulp sinsiel , et yipm ko yimp Wulapm Weink yupulp , et kil ko yok yipm yapmonemp ko yitityokuorel . Wulapm Weink ka ontoyonel , kil kakorokn nirkimp yapmonemp sepmel ankilel nek yipm yep ka yipm aiyimpilel . Karokn . Kil kako nkis eik yok yipmel .
Kona Pirpm Wulapm Weinkel na yupul niokn ntoka yete ka kakirp noel , yipm korokn yukur .
Sank keiye apm apulel , ka apm apulp yipm ementitmuaken ka akei Jisas nkaelel , nako yipm semp ntinkirai yupulp na yipm karep nkamump salpiknin kilelel nako yipm yer sepmel yopmoiel .
Ka Wulapm Weink yuwak omoule kilpe ka aknamniumpuai Devitel niuwuwul kil amu Israel apulp na kil na nantip mo yerkomp anel . Omoule kilpe kumpueik Wulapm Weink nak nuwar apulpel ka Jisas .

aser Wulapm Weink kako yekei Pirpm ankilel ka ar yipm nilmpniumpuaipmel nako yiki omoule entieaikn aiyipmel nimpil nkierp nako yipm yer sepmel yopmoiel . Kil apul sopilelel , ka kil akei mintenk soplekekn ka kumpueik kil akeiel ka kil aki Jisas Krais ar yemp muanel .

Ar yetne kilelel , marpm nimpiliekn suknel ntoka 100 litael ka ontokitie krepitie lekekn . Nti Juda ka ale mpep keielel akei nkualip ontowule antuol irpm sinsi antuolel , apulp na nti kakorokn yer sankuork , nti kako silmpuaink yer niampepm Wulapm Weinkel .

Nti mpurel ka nkis minamp kuoretel ka sop omoule na yuwi yo yeteel , ko yipm pelkel semp nti , yipm kakorokn walil . Nti omoule mpurel ka ar nkis yapmonemp arankelel , nti ka apei yemp nimpiempel . Nti omoule yipm ko wonempyupulp nti , aser yipm'o yekei wonempel yupulp minamp nti nkisel . Yipm korokn yupul sop nti apulel .

Nti omoule Wulapm Weinkel , karep kil aiyimpukuap nti apulp na nti na sop upuikn ankilelel , yapmonemp yapelel antuol ka antempil apmoi . Nti omoule Wulapm Weinkel kile , sepm kuoret sinsi eikusuknel ka ninkemp ntiel , ka Wulapm Weink nkamp apul la lekekn apulp na yupul niokn sepmel yer ntiel . Et an ka nimpiriepmel ampulp .
